tag_list: information-technology, marketing, b2b, b2c, technology, video-games, e-commerce, graphic-design, 3d-animation
overview:
Jorge Caicedo, an accomplished and creative marketing professional who brings more than 10 years of high technology operations experience to his role. Mr. Caicedo is currently Technology, Marketing Manager for Andersen Environmental, an environmental consulting firm based in Los Angeles, California.

Prior to Andersen Environmental, Mr. Caicedo was responsible for all aspects of Microsoft Dynamics and SCS (Specialist in Custom Software) marketing strategies and activities nationwide, including corporate marketing, field marketing, product and solution marketing, sales enablement and marketing operations functions.

Before joining Microsoft Dynamics SCS, Mr. Caicedo was the Senior Marketing Director at Micro League, Inc., a value-added technology company that offered computer and electronic products, services, and solutions to individual consumers, small and medium businesses, large enterprises, as well as for government and educational institutions. Mr. Caicedo was responsible for all aspects of the company product plans and strategies PR, corporate relationships and marketing.

Before Micro League, Mr. Caicedo spent 4 years at Pufinan Ltd., a leading advertising, direct marketing and communications agency specialized in government projects in Colombia, where he held a number of marketing and sales positions, including General Executive Director and member of the board, where he provided guidance on strategy, marketing, business development, financing and product development. While holding his position, Mr. Caicedo also served as advisor and director of marketing in regional political campaigns in Cali, Colombia.

Andersen Environmental announces mobile-optimized web site.
